extendedInfo.description: Lead a platoon of elite Marine Raiders! Battle an intractable enemy during WW2! Choose your battle-plan, select your weapons and if need be fix your bayonets. You'll wade ashore during a daring nighttime landing or plunge into frantic close-quarters fire-fights in this thrilling text-based game.

reviews.title: Admire
reviews.comment: Cool... would be nice to have more missions, maybe longer ones as this one was very short... will give five stars then
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: More missions coming\302\277\302\241
reviews.comment: Loving the old school choice based text games! Its detailed with every choice having a different outcome but i was expecting it to be longer, good little app though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Loved it, every option led to a completely different result, amazing game all the way. Would like to see a little more options and maybe even a little map that u cud bring up and individualy place troops at specified locations, either way I loved it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I like how I can make all of my own choices to really personalize my game experience. I think it would be really be cool if the game had multiple missions so it would be longer. But still a great game!
reviews.author: Justin Jobe

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Very well done. It be cool if more people found this so the company can have more money to make more of these. It\'s short, but it\'s definitely worth your time.
reviews.author: Nelson Gray

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Really like the choose your own adventure idea. A little short, but very fun. Love the story line as well. Keep it up! Would love to see more!
reviews.author: Thomas Howard

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Fun but shorter than I would have liked. My best is 5 out of 7. :P
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great game with good choices. Needs more missions though because completed in about 10 mins
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It was awesome but there were many grammar mistakes so it was hars to understand sometimes.
reviews.author: Bill Riets

reviews.title: Great game.
reviews.comment: Fantastically written, wonderful plot and character description. This is the only writer that has made me want to buy a game. Actually bought Zombie Exodus part 3 by Hosted, and it was well worth it. Keep \'em coming!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AWESOME!
reviews.comment: Days of torture trying to find a cool new app. I finally found that app! It just never gets old! It would be nice to have different scenarios but I guess we have to wait. :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game!!!
reviews.comment: I am hooked on these games.Cant wait for more. Best i have played on a phone.
reviews.author: kirk williams

reviews.title: Fun Game. A must have for milti enthusiasts!
reviews.comment: 5 out of 7 commendations and I can\'t get the full 7 yet. Anyone know how I can? Fun game! Gotta pack lots of ammo, take a mortar, fortify the beach, man the MG an AA, and husband your rounds.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too Short
reviews.comment: I thought this game would be like zombie exodus. A long, risky, and amazing game full of freedom and if you want, romance. This game was not that. One mission. That\'s all. One mission and you\'re done. Pretty lame.
reviews.author: Rodney Schunk

reviews.title: Fantastic!!
reviews.comment: This is absolutely one of the best and funnest games I have ever played on my phone! The decisions u make at a certain point in the game can impact the entire outcome of the game for better or worse, so u better think hard on the decisions you make in the game. You & your mens lives may depend on it!!  Way cool for a phone app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could See It Happening!
reviews.comment: This is a great app!! Aside from the grammatical errors, the writing is awesome and sucks you right into the story! Excellent for passing time on the el, waiting, or working...
reviews.author: Adam Shaw

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Your imagination really brings to life the bullets whipping overhead and splintering branches, and the great writing certainly helps! Wish it was longer, though!
reviews.author: Spencer Schaubert

reviews.title: Great story but too short
reviews.comment: Only took about 25 minutes, could be 5 stars if it had more chapters.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally.... Tired of everything being Army based...
reviews.comment: There\'s strong... Then there\'s Army strong....................... Thankfully we have Marines - Semper Fi  A really enjoyable download.
reviews.author: A Google User
